mapper.select: SELECT a.cdgSeq , a.cdgName , b.cdcDelNy , b.cdcSeq , b.cdcName , b.cdcRegDt , b.cdcUdtDt FROM codegroup a LEFT JOIN code b ON b.cdgSeq = a.cdgSeq WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.cdgSeq = #{cdgSeq} AND b.cdcseq = #{cdcSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO code ( cdcName , cdcRegDt , cdcUdtDt , cdcDelNy , cdgSeq ) VALUES ( #{cdcName} , now() , now() , 0 , #{cdgSeq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE code SET cdcUdtDt = now() , cdcDelNy = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND cdcSeq = #{cdcSeq}
UPDATE code SET cdcUdtDt = now() , cdcDelNy = 0 WHERE 1 = 1 AND cdcSeq = #{cdcSeq}
